regen.absent_element: specification for reestablishing call when it fails in non-lead traction vehicle
regen.new_specification: When the call fails in a non-lead traction vehicle, the system shall automatically reconnect or prompt the driver in that vehicle to call the lead cab and request reestablishment of the call.

regen.absent_element: procedure for a driver in a non-lead cab to reestablish the call after it fails
regen.new_specification: If the call fails in any non-lead traction vehicle, the system shall provide a mechanism for the driver in that vehicle to initiate a request to the lead cab for reestablishment of the call.

regen.absent_element: procedure for driver in non-lead cab to request reestablishment of call after failure
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism for the driver in a non-lead cab to initiate a request to the lead cab to reestablish the call if it fails.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
